title: Agoraphobia
content:
Ask your healthcare provider, phone Healthline 0800 611 116 or Anxiety NZ 0800 ANXIETY (0800 269 4389) to see if there is one in your area. If you can’t go out to a group, look for an online forum and find one that works for you.
